message: Let's start off on a good foot, Bob. This offer ensures a good deal for both of us.
Alice, since money devalues faster for you (20%) than for me (10%), this split is actually favorable for both of us. If you reject, you'll lose more value than I will in the next round.
Bob, I understand the inflation rates are different, but your previous offer wasn't fair to me.  This offer provides a more balanced outcome. Let's close the deal.
